name: C. Most Similar Words
statement:
You are given n words of length m, consisting of lowercase Latin
alphabet letters. The i-th word is denoted s_i.In one move you can
choose and change the letter at that position to the previous or next
letter in alphabetical order. For example: you can change ” to ” or to
”; ” can only be changed to ”; ” can only be changed to ”. The between
two words is the number of moves required to make them equal. For
example, the between "" and "" is 1 + 10 + 0 + 0 = 11.Find the minimum
of s_i and s_j such that (i < j). In other words, find the minimum over
all possible pairs of the n words.
